chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
well_founded R

Premises:
well_founded : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> Prop
Acc_intro_generator : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), nat -> well_founded R -> well_founded R
well_founded_lt_compat : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (R : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> f x < f y) -> well_founded R
well_founded_inv_lt_rel_compat : forall (A : Set) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (F : A -> nat -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> inv_lt_rel A F x y) -> well_founded R
well_founded_induction_type : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall P : A -> Type, (forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
well_founded_induction : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall P : A -> Set, (forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
Fix : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall P : A -> Type, (forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : A, P x
well_founded_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall P : A -> Prop, (forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
Fix_F_inv : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall (P : A -> Type) (F : forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x), (forall (x : A) (f g : forall y : A, R y x -> P y), (forall (y : A) (p : R y x), f y p = g y p) -> F x f = F x g) -> forall (x : A) (r s : Acc R x), Fix_F P F r = Fix_F P F s
well_founded_induction_type_2 : forall (A B : Type) (R : A * B -> A * B -> Prop) (P : A -> B -> Type), well_founded R -> (forall (x : A) (x' : B), (forall (y : A) (y' : B), R (y, y') (x, x') -> P y y') -> P x x') -> forall (a : A) (b : B), P a b
Fix_eq : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (Rwf : well_founded R) (P : A -> Type) (F : forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x), (forall (x : A) (f g : forall y : A, R y x -> P y), (forall (y : A) (p : R y x), f y p = g y p) -> F x f = F x g) -> forall x : A, Fix Rwf P F x = F x (fun (y : A) (_ : R y x) => Fix Rwf P F y)
Radd_ext : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) radd
Rmul_ext : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) rmul
ARmul_1_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x
ARadd_0_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x
ARadd_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (radd x rO) x
ARmul_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul x rO) rO
ARmul_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)
lt_wf = well_founded_ltof nat (fun m : nat => m) : well_founded lt
ARadd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
Acc_inv : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A), Acc R x -> forall y : A, R y x -> Acc R y
Acc_intro : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A), (forall y : A, R y x -> Acc R y) -> Acc R x
ARmul_assoc1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (rmul x y) z) (rmul (rmul y z) x)
well_founded_gtof : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat), well_founded (gtof A f)
well_founded_ltof : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat), well_founded (ltof A f)
ARmul_assoc2 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (rmul y x) z) (rmul (rmul y z) x)
ARadd_assoc2 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd (radd y x) z) (radd (radd y z) x)
ARdistr_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul z (radd x y)) (radd (rmul z x) (rmul z y))
well_founded_inv_rel_inv_lt_rel : forall (A : Set) (F : A -> nat -> Prop), well_founded (inv_lt_rel A F)
Nat.gt_wf : forall z : nat, well_founded (fun n m : nat => m < n <= z)
Z.lt_wf : forall z : Z, well_founded (fun n m : Z => (z <= n < m)%Z)
